launcher.title: Translate
launcher.description: Manually translate a phrase. Create language files for plugins.

infohub_translate_manual.THE_TEXT_YOU_WANT_TO_TRANSLATE._KEY: The text you want to translate.
infohub_translate_manual.THE_TEXT_YOU_GET_AFTER_TRANSLATION._KEY: The text you get after translation.
Select destination language. Write text. Click translate
infohub_translate_manual.PICK_A_LANGUAGE_TO_TRANSLATE_FROM_KEY: Pick a language to translate from
infohub_translate_manual.WRITE_SOMETHING_SO_I_CAN_TRANSLATE_KEY: Write something so i can translate
infohub_translate_manual.PICK_A_LANGUAGE_TO_TRANSLATE_TO_KEY: Pick a language to translate to

infohub_translate_plugin.LISTS_ALL_CLIENT_PLUGINS_THAT_CAN_HAVE_T: Lists all client plugins that can have translation files.
infohub_translate_plugin.REFRESH_OF_THE_LISTS_IS_DONE_KEY: Refresh of the lists is done
infohub_translate_plugin.PICK_ONE_OR_MORE_PLUGINS_TO_TRANSLATE_KE: Pick one or more plugins to translate
infohub_translate_plugin.PICK_ONE_OR_MORE_LANGUAGES_TO_TRANSLATE_: Pick one or more languages to translate to
